trans-unit.source: Defines endpoint or contract behaviors that can export custom metadata.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 메타 데이터를 내보낼 수 있는 끝점 또는 계약 동작을 정의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To modify and extend the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) exported by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> objects, implement the IWsdlExportExtension interface on an endpoint, contract, or operation behavior (an object that implements either <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior>) and add the behavior to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 수정 하 고는 WSDL 웹 서비스 설명 언어 ()에서 내보낸 확장할 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>끝점, 계약 또는 작업 동작에서 IWsdlExportExtension 인터페이스를 구현 하는 개체 (중 하나를 구현 하는 개체 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior>, 또는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior>)에 동작을 추가 하 고는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A>, 또는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A>속성.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can also implement IWsdlExportExtension on a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: 또한 구현할 수도 있습니다 IWsdlExportExtension <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > IWsdlExportExtension implementations are never invoked if they are implemented as an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior> 로 구현 될 경우에 IWsdlExportExtension 구현이 호출 되지 않습니다

trans-unit.source: IWsdlExportExtension does not export custom policy assertions even though [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] exports custom binding policy assertions to the appropriate element inside WSDL.
trans-unit.target: IWsdlExportExtension 내보내지 않습니다 사용자 지정 정책 어설션을 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 사용자 지정 바인딩 정책 어설션을 WSDL 내의 해당 요소로 내보내는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If you want to export custom policy assertions, implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension> interface.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 정책 어설션을 내보낼 하려는 경우 구현에서 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension>인터페이스.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension>

trans-unit.source: The metadata publication process begins by calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A?displayProperty=fullName> which in turn calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for each endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 호출 하 여 메타 데이터 게시 프로세스 시작 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A?displayProperty=fullName>를 호출 하 여 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>각 끝점에 대 한.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint is exported by first exporting its contract.When exporting a contract the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter?displayProperty=fullName> calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on all IWsdlExportExtension implementations on the contract, and operation behaviors for that contract.
trans-unit.target: 첫 번째 내보내기의 계약 하 여 끝점이 내보내집니다. 계약을 내보낼 때의 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter?displayProperty=fullName>호출은 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메서드 계약 및 작업 동작에서 모든 IWsdlExportExtension 구현에서 해당 계약에 대 한.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Operations that use wildcard actions are not exported in metadata, so IWsdlExportExtension implementations on operation behaviors for these operations are not exported.
trans-unit.target: 와일드 카드 동작을 사용 하는 작업 하므로 이러한 작업에 대 한 작업 동작의 IWsdlExportExtension 구현은 내보내지지 않습니다 메타 데이터로 내보내지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: After exporting the contract, the port and binding are exported and exported policy expressions are attached.
trans-unit.target: 계약을 내보낸 후 포트 및 바인딩이 내보내지며 내보낸 정책 식이 첨부 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A> and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A> methods provide access to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> so that IWsdlExportExtension implementations can report recoverable errors and warnings through the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 둘 다는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A>및 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A>에 대 한 액세스를 제공 하는 메서드는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>IWsdlExportExtension 구현을 복구할 수 있는 오류 및 경고를 통해 보고할 수 있도록는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A>속성.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A>

trans-unit.source: The context objects passed into both methods provide convenient mappings from exported WSDL elements to properties of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objects.
trans-unit.target: 두 메서드 모두에 전달 된 컨텍스트 개체의 속성을 내보낸된 WSDL 요소에서 편리한 매핑을 제공 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>및 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>개체.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>

trans-unit.source: If an IWsdlExportExtension implementation throws an exception on export, the generated metadata is in an inconsistent state and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> object should be discarded.
trans-unit.target: 생성 된 메타 데이터 일관성이 없는 상태에는 내보내기에 예외를 throw 하는 IWsdlExportExtension 구현, 및 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>개체를 삭제 해야 합니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Custom export extension must run after the built-in serializer populates the service description.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 사용자 지정 내보내기 확장은 기본 제공 serializer가 서비스 설명을 채운 이후에 실행 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Writes custom Web Services Description Language (WSDL) elements into the generated WSDL for a contract.
trans-unit.target: 계약에 대해 생성 된 WSDL에 사용자 지정 WSDL 웹 서비스 설명 언어 () 요소를 씁니다.

trans-unit.source: The ExportContract method is called when the metadata export system is exporting the contract.
trans-unit.target: ExportContract 메서드는 메타 데이터 내보내기 시스템이 계약을 내보낼 때 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Only contract and operation behaviors implementing <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> get the ExportContract call.
trans-unit.target: 구현 하는 유일한 계약 및 작업 동작 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension>ExportContract 호출을 get.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension>

trans-unit.source: All behaviors implementing <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> get the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: 구현 하는 모든 동작 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension>가져오기는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A>호출.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension>

trans-unit.source: Use the `context` parameter to modify the WSDL to be exported.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 `context` 내보낼 WSDL을 수정 하려면 매개 변수입니다.

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the Example section.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 "예" 섹션을 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter"></xref> that exports the contract information.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter"> </xref> 계약 정보를 내보냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Provides mappings from exported WSDL elements to the contract description.
trans-unit.target: 내보낸된 WSDL 요소에서 계약 설명으로의 매핑을 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: Writes custom Web Services Description Language (WSDL) elements into the generated WSDL for an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 끝점에 대해 생성 된 WSDL에 사용자 지정 WSDL 웹 서비스 설명 언어 () 요소를 씁니다.

trans-unit.source: Implement the ExportEndpoint method to modify the WSDL exported for an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 끝점에 대해 내보낸 WSDL을 수정 하려면 ExportEndpoint 메서드를 구현 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called after the contract has been exported by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 계약 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A> 내보낸 후

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter"></xref> that exports the endpoint information.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter"> </xref> 끝점 정보를 내보냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Provides mappings from exported WSDL elements to the endpoint description.
trans-unit.target: 내보낸된 WSDL 요소에서 끝점 설명으로의 매핑을 제공합니다.
